Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. Given its value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $14000, which is a significant discount compared to its market value of $15000. We hope this offer aligns well with your budget and allows you to experience the benefits of our product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
